definition: a saw/to cut with a saw

sentences.english: The ability of the bending and cracking resistance of the steel saw blade was evaluated by bending strength and deflection.
sentences.chinese: 用弯曲强度及挠度评定钢锯条抗弯曲断裂的能力。

sentences.english: Hacksaw Ridge and Lion also received six nods.
sentences.chinese: 《血战钢锯岭》和《雄狮》也获得六项提名。

sentences.english: The we cut the bottom section of the bars off with a hacksaw.
sentences.chinese: 我们减少的底部一节的酒吧加上钢锯。

sentences.english: The horn was split down the center into two halves with a hacksaw, while being held in a vise.
sentences.chinese: 我把角夹在台虎钳上用钢锯从中间锯成两半。

sentences.english: A tube cutter works best but you can use a hacksaw.
sentences.chinese: 最好用截管器，不过用钢锯也能凑合。

sentences.english: A hacksaw squat is a one legged lunge in a lower body workout.
sentences.chinese: 钢锯蹲腿是在一个较低的身体锻炼冲刺一。

sentences.english: Cut PVC pipe for diffusion panel fabric with a hacksaw.
sentences.chinese: PVC管材切割面板的扩散织物钢锯。

definition: a saw/to cut with a saw
